section.title: Display Register History
section.para: To review detailed information regarding all transactions which took place on a Cash Register (including who conducted the transaction what the start and end balance were and which journal entry they were posted to), follow this path: Sales > Reports > Register History. The following screen will appear:

Register History
When reviewing Cash Register history, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Cash Register history for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Cash Register history you want to display.
Transactions conducted on and after this date will be displayed.
Transactions conducted on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists Cash Register transaction history, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
